messages.content:
PARTY UPDATE: The beer party is tomorrow! Lots of food, beer & fun! 

For those of you who canât make it, we still want to include you so check out our Facebook page during the party to see the Party webcam, pictures, tweets, get a âvirtualâ beer and a chance to win some fun prizes. 

Everyone who is coming needs to bring photo I.D. âCheck-inâ to mvnp on your mobile phone when you arrive to get your beer tickets (we also have ârealâ tickets if your phone doesnât have internet). We will also be collecting food & money donations for the Hawaii Food Bank. 

Parking at our building (First Hawaiian Bank) is $5 after 5pm. Parking is NOT validated. There is also nearby street parking, Ali'i Place, municipal lots, etc. Go to the back wall elevators to get to the 21st floor. 

Thank you all for your support! We look forward to seeing you. Cheers!

Hi Fans of mvnp,

In appreciation for helping us get to 1000 likes, we'd like to invite you to our beer party next Friday, 7/29. Come celebrate with us!

Click on the invite for more information and RSVP today!

Mahalo,
mvnp
